{"command":"str_replace","path":"/workspace/django/django/db/models/sql/where.py","old_str":"        if self.connector == XOR and not connection.features.supports_logical_xor:
            # Convert if the database doesn't support XOR:
            #   a XOR b XOR c XOR ...
            # to:
            #   (a OR b OR c OR ...) AND (a + b + c + ...) == 1
            lhs = self.__class__(self.children, OR)
            rhs_sum = reduce(
                operator.add,
                (Case(When(c, then=1), default=0) for c in self.children),
            )
            rhs = Exact(1, rhs_sum)
            return self.__class__([lhs, rhs], AND, self.negated).as_sql(
                compiler, connection
            )
","new_str":"        if self.connector == XOR and not connection.features.supports_logical_xor:
            # Convert if the database doesn't support XOR:
            #   a XOR b XOR c XOR ...
            # to:
            #   (a OR b OR c OR ...) AND (a + b + c + ...) %% 2 == 1
            lhs = self.__class__(self.children, OR)
            rhs_sum = reduce(
                operator.add,
                (Case(When(c, then=1), default=0) for c in self.children),
            )
            # Use modulo 2 of the sum to get parity (true when an odd number of
            # arguments are true).
            rhs_mod = rhs_sum % 2
            rhs = Exact(1, rhs_mod)
            return self.__class__([lhs, rhs], AND, self.negated).as_sql(
                compiler, connection
            )
","security_risk":"LOW"}
function.name: str_replace_editor

args.old_str:
if self.connector == XOR and not connection.features.supports_logical_xor:
            # Convert if the database doesn't support XOR:
            #   a XOR b XOR c XOR ...
            # to:
            #   (a OR b OR c OR ...) AND (a + b + c + ...) == 1
            lhs = self.__class__(self.children, OR)
            rhs_sum = reduce(
                operator.add,
                (Case(When(c, then=1), default=0) for c in self.children),
            )
            rhs = Exact(1, rhs_sum)
            return self.__class__([lhs, rhs], AND, self.negated).as_sql(
                compiler, connection
            )
args.new_str:
if self.connector == XOR and not connection.features.supports_logical_xor:
            # Convert if the database doesn't support XOR:
            #   a XOR b XOR c XOR ...
            # to:
            #   (a OR b OR c OR ...) AND (a + b + c + ...) %% 2 == 1
            lhs = self.__class__(self.children, OR)
            rhs_sum = reduce(
                operator.add,
                (Case(When(c, then=1), default=0) for c in self.children),
            )
            # Use modulo 2 of the sum to get parity (true when an odd number of
            # arguments are true).
            rhs_mod = rhs_sum % 2
            rhs = Exact(1, rhs_mod)
            return self.__class__([lhs, rhs], AND, self.negated).as_sql(
                compiler, connection
            )
